This plugin collects data on available cameras and their capabilities.

*Plugin Name:* Camera Plugin

*Class Name:* {{{org.androidanalyzer.plugins.camera.CameraPlugin}}}

The following table defines the structure of data being inserted in the report, and the APIs or methods used to retrieve the value.

|| *Node* || *Node* || *Node* || *Node* || *Value* || *Metric* || *Retrieval Method* ||
|| Cameras || || || || || || ||
||      || Camera-{{{<x>}}} || || || || || ||
||      || || Location || || _string_ (e.g. _front_, _back_ || || Unknown, N/A ||
||      || || Resolution || || || || {{{Camera.Parameters.getSupportedPictureSizes()}}} ||
||      || || Flash || || [_string_, ...] (comma-separated list of values: _off_, _on_, _red-eye_, _torch_) || || {{{Camera.Parameters.getSupportedFlashModes()}}} ||
||      || || Image || || || || ||
||      || || || Autofocus || || [_string_, ...] (comma-separated list of values: _auto_, _edof_, _fixed_, _infinity_, _macro_) || {{{Camera.Parameters.getSupportedFocusModes()}}} ||
||      || || || Zoom || _boolean_ || || {{{Camera.Parameters.isZoomSupported()}}} ||
||      || || || Geotagging || _boolean_ || || Unknown, N/A ||
||      || || || Hand jitter reduction || || _boolean_ || || Unknown, N/A ||
||      || || || Red eye reduction|| || || Check if {{{Camera.Parameters.getSupportedFlashModes()}}} returns _red-eye_||
||      || || || Face recognition || || _boolean_ || || Unknown, N/A ||
||      || || || Dynamic range optimization || || _boolean_ || || Unknown, N/A ||
||      || || || Formats || [_string_, ...] (comma-separated list of values: _JPEG_, _NV16_, _NV21_, _RGB_565_, _YUY2_) || || {{{Camera.Parameters.getSupportedPictureFormats()}}} ||
||      || || || Resolutions || || || ||
||      || || || Supported compression ratios || || || ||
||      || || Video || || || || ||
||      || || || Self timer || || || ||
||      || || || Flash / movie light || || || ||
||      || || || Zoom || || || ||
||      || || || White balance / brightness|| || || ||
||      || || || Color tone || || || ||
||      || || || Self-portrait video mode || || || ||
||      || || || Long video capture || || || ||
